definition: to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.chinese: 但黃金投資者記恨這個。

sentences.english: When someone has deeply hurt you, it can be surprisingly beneficial to your grudge.
sentences.chinese: 有人深深傷害你時，你很難做到不記恨心頭。

sentences.english: I never get my knife in someone, because I know that can't resolve anything.
sentences.chinese: 我從不記恨某人，因爲我知道這對解決問題毫無幫助。

sentences.english: That he could trust, but not resent those who let him down.
sentences.chinese: 他可以去信任，但不去記恨讓他失望的人。

sentences.english: That was a thousand years ago, Mom. How long are you gonna hold the grudge?
sentences.chinese: 那都是一千年以前的事了，媽，你還打算記恨多久。

sentences.english: Instead of holding mistakes against them for life, try to forgive someone.
sentences.chinese: 與其因某人犯錯而記恨一輩子，不如選擇寬恕。

sentences.english: I was wondering if Xiaoxian would hate me.
sentences.chinese: 我呢，一直也害怕小仙兒會記恨我。

sentences.english: Also bears a grudge clearly uselessly, remains does not have the time, detains is bored.
sentences.chinese: 也明白記恨無益，留不得時間，強留更是無聊。

sentences.english: Life is too short, should not be used to bear grudges.
sentences.chinese: 生命太短暫了，不應該用來記恨。

sentences.english: He may accept your apology, but the offence will be chalked up against you.
sentences.chinese: 他也許會接受你的道歉，但你的冒犯將被記恨在心。

sentences.english: Unfair or abusive treatment and training will lead to an Akita that resents you.
sentences.chinese: 不公平或過濫的對待訓練會導致她記恨你。

sentences.english: It may sour in hated dependence or independence.
sentences.chinese: 它可能酸記恨依賴或獨立。
